activities: Inference Data LLC complies with the EU Safe Harbor framework as set forth by the Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of data from the European Union.We collect personal information (name, address, telephone number or email address) when users and/or clients provide that information for marketing purposes including email and news updates, when users request a demonstration or meeting. Additionally, should Inference be engaged in contract with a firm or firms based in the EU for electronic discovery and legal review services, Inference collects, processes and stores data for the organization or organizations for purposed of discovery and review.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer and B2B data in all forms
recoursemech: Via the EU DPAs for HR data, and the DMA Safe Harbor Program for all other data.
